name: Holmes Sherlock
description: Playing as Holmes Sherlock, the world's best detective, crack the case of the murder of wealthy professor and mastermind, Professor Brosseau. First, collect spare change in the front yard to bribe your way into the exclusive manor. Once you're inside, collect all the clues and evidence of the crime scene before it's too late. But watch out! The spirits of those Brosseau had wronged have come to haunt what's left of his estate! Avoid the ghosts and collect both the change and clues to escape with your life! (Use arrow keys to move Sherlock)
